testcase.name: Verify POST Login api endpoint should fetch login token

testsuite.name: Verify HTTP DELETE method by using delete user api endpoint

testcase.name: Verify HTTP DELETE method by using delete user api endpoint should delete an existing user using delete http method
testcase.classname: should delete an existing user using delete http method

testsuite.name: Verify HTTP GET using get all users api endpoint

testcase.name: Verify HTTP GET using get all users api endpoint should fetch all the available users with auth login token
testcase.classname: should fetch all the available users with auth login token

testcase.name: Verify HTTP GET using get all users api endpoint should fetch all the available users with basic auth
testcase.classname: should fetch all the available users with basic auth

testsuite.name: Verify HTTP PATCH by updating user api endpoint

testcase.name: Verify HTTP PATCH by updating user api endpoint should update an existing user using patch http method
testcase.classname: should update an existing user using patch http method

testsuite.name: Verify HTTP POST create user api endpoint

testcase.name: Verify HTTP POST create user api endpoint should fetch token for successful login
testcase.classname: should fetch token for successful login

testsuite.name: Verify HTTP POST register user api endpoint

testcase.name: Verify HTTP POST register user api endpoint should receive error message for unsuccessful registration
testcase.classname: should receive error message for unsuccessful registration

testsuite.name: Verify HTTP PUT method by updating update user api endpoint

testcase.name: Verify HTTP PUT method by updating update user api endpoint should update an existing user using put http method
testcase.classname: should update an existing user using put http method

testcase.name: Verify HTTP Status Verify 200 HTTP Status should fetch all the available users with auth login token
testcase.classname: should fetch all the available users with auth login token

testcase.name: Verify HTTP Status Verify 201 HTTP Status should create new user
Verify HTTP Status Verify 204 HTTP Status should delete an existing user using delete http method
testcase.classname: should delete an existing user using delete http method

testcase.name: Verify HTTP Status Verify 400 HTTP Status should return 400 for an incomplete user json payload request
testcase.classname: should return 400 for an incomplete user json payload request

testcase.name: Verify HTTP Status Verify 404 HTTP Status should return 404 for an unknown user endpoint
testcase.classname: should return 404 for an unknown user endpoint
